A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie I’ve ever watched. Horrible battle scenes\, except for Rey and Kylo in the throne room. Please the whole fleet gets blown up\, half the transports\, then only enough of the resistance survives that they fit in the falcon really? The bombers were such trash\, use Y wings not sitting ducks... no actual Luke and leia reunion\, then Luke never actually fights. Such a terrible\, terrible movie.
